titleStmt.title: By the King, a proclamation for the apprehending certain offenders therein named and for the better security of His Majesty and his government from dangers arising from popish recusants
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1660-1685 : Charles II)
Charles II, King of England, 1630-1685.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by John Bill, Christopher Barker, Thomas Newcomb, and Henry Hills, ...,

notesStmt.note: "Given at the court at Whitehall, the seventeenth day of November, in the thirtieth year of His Majesties reign."
Reproduction of the original in the Huntington Library.
